comment: I highly recommend not taking her class. between her insane attendance policy and the way she arbitrarily grades projects, its just not worth it.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: ok class but i dont think she's a good teacher. Grades things really harshly, and can be mean to students. nothing ever seems to be good enough for her.

Makus is an incredible professor! Don't take her class if you're unwilling or unable to commit to the attendance policy, but all of her expectations WILL make you a better student. She grades critiques a little harsh, so make sure you go above and beyond. Her class is extremely entertaining, challenging, and will awaken unrealized potential.
Awesome teacher!!! No book required. Attendance is mandatory but you are not gonna want to miss this class! Very helpful and has a great sense of humor

She's nice, funny and very helpful. Attendance is basically mandatory because everyday you have to work with your group to contribute. No textbook required. You will have fun and learn something at the same time.
